essay:
The people gathered around a poor little boy. They were all shocked to see this, until an old lady said something. The bustling streets of Sembawang Shopping Centre was crowded with tons of people. A little boy, Leon, was sitting at the corner of the taco stall.

His shirt was torn, his white shoes became black and he is very lonely. A few days has passed and nobody came to lend out a helping hand for him, until, an old lady carrying groceries came and she said" Here you go, little boy." passing Leon a taco and a mineral water.

"What is your name?” asked the old lady. Leon said” My name is Leon.” “What a poor little boy!” She sighed. The old lady wanted to know more information about Leon so she asked” Where are your parents? What happened to them?” While Leon eyes welled up with tears, he continued” my parents were eaten by a rhinoceros in London. We were supposed to be buying groceries in the supermarket. But there it when, straight for my parents. The rhinoceros escaped from the zoo but after that the zookeeper had managed to get it back to the zoo.”

After 2 days, the old lady appeared but Leon was not at the corner anymore. Someone had brought him back to take care of him. The old lady smiled and thought” If only Leon was here, I could have brought him back to my home.”
